staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000010: Oh! I...I didn't expect to see you here...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000020: Uh... How did you even get here? Those devices are one time use and rather hard to make...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000040: I just wanted to bring ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; back, you know?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000050: We all wanted that, but he just wouldn't come...kept talking about duty in his letters...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000060: It was really hard to build something that could transfer objects from place to place!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000080: How did she even fix it?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000090: Well never mind. You're here now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000100: At least one of you came willingly...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000130: I shouldn't really help you, but...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000140: It's hard to see him so distressed.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000150: Perhaps it was truly wrong of me to drag him back. Maybe he'll come back of his own free will someday...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000160: Alright. I'll help you. It won't be easy though...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000170: We didn't want him to run away so we moved him somewhere...special...for the time being.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000180: If you could get me a few items I should be able to pull together something that will whisk you past the barrier.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000190: There should be ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;. If you look around the ^c:1486b0;tree houses^c:pop; here you should find them.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000200: We shouldn't be seen talking until you find the ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000210: It would be bad if they suspected something was happening...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000220: Yes, this looks like everything we need!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000230: Now if you just give me a minu-
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000240: I apologise, the device initiated before I was quite ready.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000250: I hope I didn't cause you too much unnecessary concern...?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000251: That's great, we need to figure out where Tomti has taken ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Vorlen^c:pop;.
Could you take a look around the ^c:1486b0;Town Hall^c:pop; and the ^c:1486b0;Museum^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000252: There may be some clues there.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000253: I understand that you're probably very busy right now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000254: But please come back soon. This town can't work without ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop; after all.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000255: Oh! You managed to convince ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; to fix it?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000256: Is that the ^c:d03e37;teleporter^c:pop;? I don't trust that... but you should definitely use it.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000258: I should have spent more time with ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000259: Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I was just looking for you.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000260: Thank you so much for finding ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop;!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000261: I hope he hasn't caused you much trouble.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000262: I just finished talking with him and he was in a much better mood.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000263: Judging by that, I doubt he'll be causing any more trouble...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000264: Not for the time being anyway.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000265: Well... I'll be going back to the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop; now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000266: We'll keep ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop; out of your hair for now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000267: Hi ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I was looking for you!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000268: I didn't expect to be back here after that previous... situation.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000269: I generally don't leave the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000270: There is always someone to converse with, or construction to be done.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000271: But there is a slight problem...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000272: Remember that teleporter I used to bring ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; home?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000274: We don't know where he could have gotten to... He hasn't been around for a while.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000275: We've all been so busy. And with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; not choosing not to stay...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000276: Maybe he's just a bit lonely...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000277: Sorry... lets get off that tangent for now.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000279: I think he may have taken ^c:1486b0;Vorlen^c:pop; as well.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000280: Can you help me look for clues?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000283: Are you ready? We need to find ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop;!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000286: Have you managed to find any clues?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000287: Hopefully we can find something about their whereabouts...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000288: Could you take a look around the ^c:1486b0;Town Hall^c:pop; and the ^c:1486b0;Museum^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000290: It looks like a ^c:d03e37;fragment^c:pop; of a ^c:d03e37;teleporter^c:pop;... maybe.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000291: If you can find another ^c:d03e37;fragment^c:pop;, it might give us more to go on!
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000292: Make sure to check around the ^c:1486b0;Town Hall^c:pop; and the ^c:1486b0;Museum^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000293: Great! Those look like parts of a ^c:d03e37;teleporter^c:pop;...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000480: They still look in decent condition.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000490: Let me take those. I'll quickly assemble them back together...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000500: I figured... since she managed last time...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000510: I don't know how ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; did it... You may need to ask her to help.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000520: I don't know how ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; managed to do it...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000530: Go see her for me, I think she will help out.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000550: I'm just here on some business.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000560: Won't be in your way for too long.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000570: How are you still here? Did something fail?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000580: These teleporters sure are finicky aren't they...
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000590: Do you want me to try and send you back again?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000620: Alright then. See you again soon.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000640: Well... come back to me when you want to leave then.
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000650: Huh... how did that not work?
staxel.village.dialogue.Rem.line:1000660: Give me a moment to see if I can get it working.
